title: Kat Loew
content:
Which font is this? (the script font)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825052000im_/http:/typophile.com/files/brommarn_4033.png)
author: saeglopur

comments.content: Another lettering by [Jorgen Grotdal](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825052000/http:/typophile.com/wiki/https%3A/%252Fdribbble.com/shots/1564874-Kat-Loew-Barber) so most probably hand-done (not a font), some kind of hand-drawn version of [That's Font Folks](http://web.archive.org/web/20140825052000/http:/www.dafont.com/thats-font-folks.font) (an usual choice for him).
